original_text: And Eleazar the priest took the brasen censers, wherewith they that were burnt had offered; and they were made broad plates for a covering of the altar:
korean_text: 제사장 엘르아살이 불탄 자들이 드렸던 놋 향로를 가져다가 쳐서 제단을 싸서

sentences.original_text: And Eleazar the priest took the brasen censers,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 엘르아살 제사장은 놋재로 만든 향로들을 가졌고,

sentences.original_text: wherewith they that were burnt had offered;
and they were made broad plates
for a covering of the altar:
